div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1180 Caria, 1932 (205) Burial: c. 460 B.C. (Robinson) Contents: 144+ AR Caria, unc. mint: 86 st. (as Traité, pl. 25, 15) Caria, unc. mint: 36 st. (as Traité, pl. 24, 16-8) Caria, unc. mint: 1 st. ANS 1967.152.457 Phaselis: 1 st. Unc. Asia Minor: 1 st. Disposition: London 2; Paris 2; New York 1 (= NC 1936, no. 12) † Robinson, NC 1936, 265-80, illus. Schlumberger, L'argent grec, p. 8, no. 2
